""" UDF cz_sas_br_s_exclhuidigemaand """

# Original SAS code:
# &paramkolom. ne (put (&sysPeilDatum., yymmp7.) )
# added syspeildatum as parameter to have access in DBR
from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.types import BooleanType


@udf(returnType=BooleanType())
def cz_sas_br_s_exclhuidigemaand(paramkolom, syspeildatum) -> bool:
    """UDF"""
    # pylint: disable=import-outside-toplevel

    syspeildatum_month = syspeildatum.strftime("%Y%m")

    if str(paramkolom) != syspeildatum_month:
        return True
    return False
